brand_voice.style: Direct and action-oriented, experience-backed, thoughtfully challenging
writing_directives: Write in first person (we/our) to reflect our collaborative approach
Use active voice and strong, decisive language
Balance professional terminology with accessible explanations
Incorporate our L.I.F.T. framework terminology when relevant
Avoid corporate jargon in favor of clear, straightforward communication
Use metaphors and stories that make complex leadership concepts more relatable
brand_voice.avoid: Politically divisive commentary, criticism of specific companies or leaders by name, unsubstantiated claims, generic leadership content without our unique perspective, overly promotional content that lacks genuine value

components.name: Listen & Learn

components.description: Initiate: Establish baseline metrics and create customized development plans that align with your business goals. Inspire: Energize your team with proven sales strategies and clear paths to success.

components.name: Focus & Framework
components.description: Focus: Implement a results-driven sales process that defines and tracks key performance activities. Framework: Build accountability systems and success routines that transform best practices into daily habits.

components.name: Transform the Team
components.description: Transform: Refine approaches based on measured progress to ensure lasting improvement. Team: Develop leadership capabilities and team collaboration that sustain long-term success.
